game_description: CPR & Basic Life Support training. Personal Edition. Includes: CPR AED Choking Recovery Position Dual Good Health brings its award winning life support training to the Oculus Quest! COMMERCIAL LICENSE Please note that if you are a commercial entity you will need an additional commercial license to use this product and unlock additional features: Training for Healthcare Professionals Integrated LMS system Web-based dashboard with performance metrics Technical Support Ongoing updates
review_1: On the Dual Good web site they show a statistic that less than 5% of the public know what to do in the case of a medical emergency. You can change that number by spending 30 minutes in this app in your Quest. Just amazing that we have the tech now to learn and practice these concepts and be ready in the event someone needs these techniques. And its likely not a stranger but a family member or loved one so well worth the investment. Check out my Overview on YouTube https://youtu.be/gZRBQUHXYzU
